ability.id NOT IN (347807, 347670, 349458, 358708, 358709, 356652, 352318, 32409, 355321, 356535, 347928, 186439, 87023, 6940, 354068, 347609, 351324, 351118, 348109, 357527, 351451, 358434, 358433, 351571, 357617, 357618, 358592, 358589, 358596, 357726, 352561, 353955, 355546, 354142, 353929, 322324, 329831)  AND target.name NOT IN ("Lady Jaina Proudmoore", "Highlord Bolvar Fordragon", "Thrall", "Medhane", "Chizad")
